ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Kunark Info - Spoiler - but if you want to save HOU RS of time you may want to read
ygData.msgSnippet: Not sure what you mean by entrance .  There ARE 4 ways (not counting swimming) in and out of Timorous Zone 1) Shuttle to Butcherblock (Catch from Boat) 2) Big
ygData.messageBody:
Not sure what you mean by "entrance". There ARE 4 ways (not counting
swimming) in and out of Timorous Zone

1) Shuttle to Butcherblock (Catch from Boat)
2) Big Boat to Fironia Vie
3) Raft to Oasis
4) Evil Boat to Overthere

2,3, and 4 are from docks...

Slyde


----- Original Message -----
From: "Lonnie Lewis" <llewis@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, April 25, 2000 11:03 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Kunark Info - Spoiler - but if you want to save HOU
RS of time you may want to read

>

> forward to the trip to BB tonight ;) (assuming the UPS people leave at
the
> door this time, hehe)
>
> Bien
